name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 002
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Arizona is looking to overturn a presidential election 6 months into a new presidency, one year after George Floyd and white supremacy has infiltrated congress even more, and every time you turn around everyone is being kind of a dick.  My Country is a little broken.
